title: Great Basin National Park: ATV Regulations
body: ATV Regulations       The operation of off-road motor vehicles, also known as All Terrain Vehicles (ATV's) or Off-Highway Vehicles (OHVs), is allowed only on designated roadways. Vehicles must be properly registered and street legal. Off-road travel is strictly prohibited. Please call the Visitor Center, 775-234-7510 for more information.
